author: Upper Echelon
description:
Go to https://surfshark.com/echelon or use code ECHELON at checkout to get 4 extra months of Surfshark VPN!


As the Video Game industry struggles under the weight of over monetization, price hikes, political activism and general fatigure... today I want to talk about highlights that not only give me confidence for a brighter future, they make me think that the worst is past, and the space will now see a resurgence of positive trends. 

Expedition 33, Arc Raiders, Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 (and others) are the harbingers of a new standard which will hopefully become increasingly common as more breakout publishers adopt beneficial business structures that support truly creative products. 

Big names like Ubisoft, Electronic Arts and Bungie have dominated the space for a long time, but smaller, more nimble development teams have the option to retake the high ground by avoiding the pitfalls and bloat of major publishing brands. 

of course major Media publications will still exist, and
title: The BRIGHTER Future of Gaming
